text: The club isnt the best place to find a lover so the bar is where I go
I found a love for me darling just dive right in and follow my lead
People fall in love in mysterious ways maybe just the touch of a hand
We keep this love in a photograph we made these memories for ourselves
I said ooh Im blinded by the lights no I cant sleep until I feel your touch
Im tryna put you in the worst mood ah every time Im with you
I cant feel my face when Im with you but I love it
I saw you dancing in a crowded room you look so happy when Im not with you
I heard that youre settled down that you found a girl and youre married now
Hello its me I was wondering if after all these years youd like to meet
We could have had it all rolling in the deep you had my heart inside your hand
But I set fire to the rain watched it pour as I touched your face
This love is difficult but its real dont be afraid well make it out of this mess
Got a long list of ex lovers theyll tell you Im insane
Players gonna play haters gonna hate baby Im just gonna shake
If you could see that Im the one who understands you
So youre a tough guy like it really rough guy
Isnt it lovely all alone heart made of glass my mind of stone
When Im away from you Im happier than ever
No fair you really know how to make me cry
This hit that ice cold Michelle Pfeiffer that white gold
When I see your face theres not a thing that I would change
Easy come easy go thats just how you live
You make me feel like Ive been locked out of heaven
Lately Ive been Ive been losing sleep dreaming about the things that we could be
Im holding on your rope got me ten feet off the ground
When the days are cold and the cards all fold
First things first Imma say all the words inside my head
Im waking up to ash and dust I wipe my brow and I sweat my rust
Thunder feel the thunder lightning then the thunder
Only know you love her when you let her go
Im going under and this time I fear theres no one to save me
Was there something I could have said to make it all stop hurting
I do the same thing I told you that I never would
Youre a sunflower I think your love would be too much
We couldnt turn around till we were upside down
Ive been fuckin hoes and poppin pillies man I feel just like a rockstar
I love it when you call me senorita I wish I could pretend I didnt need ya
You watch me bleed until I cant breathe
You deserve better than he can give to you
Girls like you love fun and yeah me too
Sugar yes please wont you come and put it down on me
Toast to the ones here today toast to the ones that we lost on the way
Hey I was doing just fine before I met you
I want something just like this
Where are you now was it all in my fantasy
Lost in your mind I wanna know
I love cheap thrills baby I dont need dollar bills
Im gonna swing from the chandelier from the chandelier
You did not break me Im still fighting for peace
Lately Ive been losing sleep dreaming about the things that we could be
And well never be royals it dont run in our blood
I want your love and I want your revenge
Cant read my cant read my no he cant read my poker face
Tell me something girl are you happy in this modern world
Everywhere Im looking now Im surrounded by your embrace
All the single ladies now put your hands up
To the left to the left everything you own in the box to the left
Look if you had one shot or one opportunity
Im not afraid to take a stand everybody come take my hand
I know sometimes things may not always make sense to you right now
I only love my bed and my momma Im sorry
You used to call me on my cellphone late night when you need my love
Grips on your waist front way back way
Its been a long day without you my friend
I still see your shadows in my room
Who am I someone thats afraid to let go
I got my peaches out in Georgia
Is it too late now to say sorry
My mama dont like you and she likes everyone
